physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are black in colour. They feature two construction workers at work. Both of them are wearing yellow helmets and gloves. They are standing at the top of a building structure, and bending forwards with a wood plank in their hands. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""Under Construction"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
